about_the_game:
Engaging and gripping story from beginning to end, twists, turns, and despair await!

WHAT!? I'VE BEEN ISEKAI'D!?

What if one day you suddenly get summoned to Another World without explanation and... die just around the corner? What if after that, a suspicious Goddess tells you that you must do something... but she's so vague to not even explain what?

In this Kinetic Novel, follow John Smith, a regular junior programmer struggling with self-confidence, as he tries to stop a murder from happening. He will keep returning after death to continue with newfound knowledge, alliances, and ideas to fulfill the mission the Goddess tasked him with. As many times as it takes.

COMPLEX, MATURE LINEAR STORY

What secrets is the Goddess hiding? Will she be a help or a hindrance?
Uncover the conspiracy behind the murder.
There are clues scattered on the way. Can YOU unravel the mystery before John does?

VARIETY OF FETISHES AND POSITIONS

Includes vaginal, anal, and oral explicit sex scenes. Consensual and... not-so-much. Missionary, cowgirl, doggy, lifted, standing, head down ass up, arm pull, against the wall, on desk, in church, pronebone, sidefuck, handjob, blowjob, assisted forced facefuck, deepthroat, ear rubbing. Gentle handholding!

FANTASY WORLD

With a carefully designed story, characters, and world, dive into this anime-inspired tale!

KEY FEATURES:

- countless deaths - roughly 4-5 hours of story, depending on your reading speed
- cinematic experience - immerse yourself at your own pace with intriguing and captivating story beats!
- dark comedy, erotica, thriller, and psychological horror all in one package!
- explicit content - enjoy the way girls are being fucked!

highlighted.name: Hold on, what do you mean!?

content_descriptors.notes:
All fictional characters are over 21 years old.

This game contains potentially disturbing scenes, deaths, murder, suicide; physical, mental, and sexual violence, non-consensual sex, explicit sex scenes, alcohol abuse, and drunk sexual activities.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
